DataElement.preferredName: Hematologic Response Disease or Disorder Status Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year of the hematologic disease or disorder status.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hematologic Response Disease or Disorder Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.
